resources.string: - You can also submit a response at locations or in reaction to media items, events or to the whole experience.
- This quide can be accessed again via the menu.
-This app lets you download and "play" a locative media experience
- You can use this app without an internet connection, however it must be set up for your area first.
- To use this app offline you will need to download the desired experience, and view the area you will be visiting with the map
- This app can be run in the background simply by clicking the Android home button, or fully closed by removing it from the recent apps window.
- As you approach a Point of Interest (POI) in your experience you will receive a sound and vibration notification, and be presented the associated media content.
